abstract: Shares in China Construction Bank, the country’s most valuable lender, slid more than 4 percent on Monday even after Bank of America poured cold water on a local newspaper report that it planned to unload its stake in the Chinese bank at a discount.
lead_paragraph: Shares in China Construction Bank, the country’s most valuable lender, slid more than 4 percent on Monday even after Bank of America poured cold water on a local newspaper report that it planned to unload its stake in the Chinese bank at a discount.

headline.main: Bank of America Dashes Talk of China Bank Sale
